thread.title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £15,000 holiday to Koh Samui
thread.title_full: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £15,000 holiday to Koh Samui - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £15,000 holiday to Koh Samui
text: The prize This prize offers a unique luxury villa experience at the stunning Panacea Koh Samui, Thailand, overlooking the Gulf of Samui, with seven nights in one of Panacea’s spacious four or five-bedroom villas, each stylishly designed to offer breathtaking panoramas. Flights from Heathrow to Koh Samui are also included (up to the value of £1,000 per person). panaceasamui.com How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . Telegraphtravel
